sourcesContent:
const img1 = require("../images/slider/slide_1.png").default
const img2 = require("../images/slider/slide_2.png").default
const img3 = require("../images/slider/slide_3.png").default

const heroSliderData = [
    {
        title: "Premium Women's Pima Polo",
        description: "When it comes to class, the Pima fabric line is unmatched. It creates the best quality for any fashion product. Pima fibers are twice as long and thicker than regular cotton fibers thanks to advanced weaving technology. This makes the polo shirt structure strong, durable, minimizes pilling, is soft, retains color, and ensures the user's health.",
        img: img1,
        color: "blue",
        path: "/catalog/t-shirt-dinosaur-01"
    },
    {
        title: "Women's Loose Fit Modal Polo",
        description: "The Women's Loose Fit Modal Polo uses premium, eco-friendly fabric technology with exclusive anti-shrink properties. This modal polo shirt is ideal for those working in dynamic environments today.",
        img: img2,
        path: "/catalog/t-shirt-dinosaur-02",
        color: "pink"
    },
    {
        title: "Women's Coolmax Lacoste Polo",
        description: "This women's polo shirt is made of coolmax material, providing a refreshing feel when worn. The design of this coolmax polo shirt is extremely comfortable and compact, promising to be a hot trend in the coming times.",
        img: img3,
        path: "/catalog/t-shirt-dinosaur-03",
        color: "orange"
    }
]

export default heroSliderData
